description: Try our easy to follow Super Green Fennel, Pea & Spinach Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Discovery Garden,Halal,High fibre,Low kilojoule,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Super Green Fennel, Pea & Spinach Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs mint leaves, chopped (plus whole leaves, to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat stock in a large saucepan until simmering.
Add fennel and peas and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 15 minutes or until fennel is just soft and peas are still bright green.
Add spinach and mint and simmer for a further 2 minutes.
Remove from the heat and allow to cool slightly before pur√©eing with a stick blender, or in a food processor, until smooth and creamy.
Reheat soup in a clean saucepan. Pour into serving bowls and garnish with mint leaves, black pepper and a drizzle of olive oil.
